function add_user {
    [ ! -z "$1" -a ! -z "$2" ] || exit
    groups=( $(awk -F , -v group="$1" '$1==group {$1=""; print; exit}' config) )
    if [ ${#groups} -eq 0 ]; then
        printf "Group '%s' is not listed.\n" "$1"
        return
    fi
    printf "Adding '%s' to group '%s'...\n" "$2" "$1"
    usermod -aG ${groups[@]} "$1"
}
